analysis.description:
CryptoQuantumTradingFund.TryUnLockCreatorBalance (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#131-150) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- unLockIdx > 0 && block.timestamp >= nextUnLockTime (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#135-149)

CryptoQuantumTradingFund._totalBalance should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#90-93)
CryptoQuantumTradingFund.creatorsAddress should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#104-111)
CryptoQuantumTradingFund.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#88)
CryptoQuantumTradingFund.fixTotalBalance should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#88-90)
CryptoQuantumTradingFund.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#86-87)
CryptoQuantumTradingFund.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#87)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.21 (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#1): it allows old versions

CryptoQuantumTradingFund.ONE_DAY_TIME_LEN (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#100) is never used in CryptoQuantumTradingFund
CryptoQuantumTradingFund.MAX_UINT32 (/unique_chucks/10/0x9bc77b01fffdb23ac0ae39a001b87376dbe9da5c.sol#103) is never used in CryptoQuantumTradingFund
